Package de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature.Creature
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ape, Snake, WaterPig
public class Animal
extends Creature
Class Animal - an animal in an adventure game. A "Animal" can be a monkey, ape,snake or water pig. They have the ability. Some attack the player and cause damage. A dead animal will drop an Item. "Animal" is a subclass from "Creature" and uses the constructor of "Creature".
Version:
23.05.2020
Author:
Moritz Link

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Animal()
    Creates an animal in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal()
      Creates an animal in the game. Animals can be an ape, a snake or a water pig. Animal calls the constructor from the superclass "Creature".
